   {/if}\n    </div>\n    <Progress progress={$documents.processingProgress} />\n  </div>\n{/if}\n","<script>\n  import SearchInput from \"./SearchInput.svelte\";\n  import Button from \"@/common/Button.svelte\";\n  import { onMount, onDestroy } from \"svelte\";\n\n  import {\n    handleSearch,\n    search as searchData,\n    userSearchQuery,\n  } from \"@/search/search\";\n  import { showSearchTips } from \"@/manager/layout.js\";\n  import { router } from \"@/router/router.js\";\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n\n  export let search = \"\";\n  export let example = false;\n  export let compact = false;\n  export let embed = false;\n  export let dialog = false;\n  let transformedQuery;\n\n  function submitSearch() {\n    handleSearch(search, !dialog);\n  }\n\n  let unsubscribe = [];\n  onMount(() => {\n    if (!example) {\n      if (dialog && searchData.filePickerUser != null) {\n        // Fill in search box for user if mounting in a dialog\n        search = userSearchQuery(searchData.filePickerUser);\n      } else {\n        unsubscribe = [\n          router.subscribe((router) => {\n            // Set query from URL if applicable\n            const route = router.resolvedRoute;\n            if (route != null && route.name == \"app\") {\n              // Try to fill in regular query if not present\n              if (route.props.q != null && route.props.q.length > 0) {\n                search = route.props.q;\n              } else {\n                search = \"\";\n              }\n            }\n          }),\n        ];\n      }\n    }\n  });\n\n  onDestroy(() => {\n    unsubscribe.forEach((x) => x());\n  });\n</script>\n\n<style lang=\"scss\">\n  .searchcontainer {\n    margin: 0 0 20px 0;\n\n    @media only screen and (max-width: 720px) {\n      margin: 0 0 30px 0;\n    }\n\n    &.example {\n      margin: 0;\n    }\n\n    .info {\n      color: $gray;\n      font-size: 12px;\n      margin-left: 5px;\n      margin-top: -3px;\n\n      > span {\n        vertical-align: middle;\n        margin-right: 2px;\n      }\n    }\n\n    :global(code) {\n      color: #8a8a8a;\n      border: solid 1px gainsboro;\n      padding: 0 2px;\n      border-radius: $radius;\n    }\n  }\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"searchcontainer\" class:example>\n  <SearchInput\n    bind:value={search}\n    bind:transformedQuery\n    {example}\n    {compact}\n    on:search={submitSearch}\n  />\n  {#if !embed && !example}\n    <div class=\"info\">\n      <span>\n        {@html $_(\"searchBar.tips\")}\n      </span>\n      <Button\n        action={true}\n        small={true}\n        nomargin={true}\n        on:click={showSearchTips}\n      >\n        {$_(\"searchBar.learnMore\")}\n      </Button>\n    </div>\n  {/if}\n</div>\n","<script>\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n  import { onMount } from \"svelte\";\n\n  import NoWhitespace from \"@/common/NoWhitespace.svelte\";\n\n  import emitter from \"@/emit.js\";\n  import { highlight } from \"@/search/parse.js\";\n  import { fieldValid, sortCompletions } from \"@/search/searchFields.js\";\n  import { orgsAndUsers } from \"@/manager/orgsAndUsers.js\";\n  import { projects } from \"@/manager/projects.js\";\n  import { textAreaResize } from \"@/util/textareaResize.js\";\n  import { languages } from \"@/api/languages.js\";\n  import {\n    autocompleteOrganizations,\n    autocompleteUsers,\n  } from \"@/api/orgAndUser.js\";\n  import { slugify } from \"@/util/string.js\";\n  import { timeoutify } from \"@/util/closure.js\";\n\n  // SVG assets\n  import searchIconSvg from \"@/assets/search_icon.svg?raw\";\n  import closeInlineSvg from \"@/assets/close_inline.svg?raw\";\n\n  const fieldAliases = {\n    projects: \"project\",\n    account: \"user\",\n    group: \"organization\",\n    order: \"sort\",\n  };\n\n  function alias(field) {\n    if (fieldAliases[field] != null) return fieldAliases[field];\n    return field;\n  }\n\n  const emit = emitter({\n    search() {},\n  });\n\n  export let value = \"\";\n  export let example = false;\n  export let compact = false;\n\n  let input;\n  let mirror;\n\n  function forceInput() {\n    if (input != null) {\n      input.value = value;\n      input.dispatchEvent(\n        new Event(\"input\", {\n          bubbles: true,\n          target: input,\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    // Dispatch input event to handle textarea resize on load\n    forceInput(value);\n  }\n\n  let selectionStart = null;\n  let selectionEnd = null;\n\n  let completions = [];\n\n  const COMPLETION_LATENCY = 100;\n\n  const completionCache = {};\n\n  const asyncComplete = timeoutify((type, fieldPost) => {\n    const key = `${type}-${fieldPost}`;\n    if (completionCache[key] != null) {\n      const [mapped, fieldPost] = completionCache[key];\n      completions = completionFilter(mapped, fieldPost);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Clear completions\n    completions = null;\n    if (type == \"org\") {\n      autocompleteOrganizations(fieldPost).then((results) => {\n        const mappedOrgs = results.map((org) => {\n          return {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: org.name,\n            feed: slugify(org.name, org.id),\n          };\n        });\n        completionCache[key] = [mappedOrgs, fieldPost];\n        completions = completionFilter(mappedOrgs, fieldPost);\n      });\n    } else if (type == \"user\") {\n      autocompleteUsers(fieldPost).then((results) => {\n        completionCache[key] = results;\n        const mappedUsers = [];\n        for (let i = 0; i < results.length; i++) {\n          const user = results[i];\n          const isMe = orgsAndUsers.me != null && user.id == orgsAndUsers.me.id;\n          const mappedUser = {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: `${user.name}${isMe ? \" (you)\" : \"\"}`,\n            feed: slugify(user.name, user.id),\n          };\n          if (isMe) {\n            mappedUsers.unshift(mappedUser);\n          } else {\n            mappedUsers.push(mappedUser);\n          }\n        }\n\n        completionCache[key] = [mappedUsers, fieldPost];\n        completions = completionFilter(mappedUsers, fieldPost);\n      });\n    }\n  }, COMPLETION_LATENCY);\n\n  function processCompletions() {\n    let count = 0;\n    for (let i = 0; i < completions.length; i++) {\n      const completion = completions[i];\n      if (completion.type == \"field\") {\n        completion.index = count;\n        count++;\n      } else {\n        completion.index = null;\n      }\n    }\n    return {\n      completions,\n      count,\n    };\n  }\n\n  function triggerCompletion(completion, deleteChars = 0) {\n    if (\n      completion.feed != null &&\n      individualSelection &&\n      selectionStart != null\n    ) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n      const insert = completion.feed + \" \";\n      const restoreSelectionPosition =\n        selectionStart + insert.length - deleteChars;\n      value =\n        value.substr(0, selectionStart - deleteChars) +\n        insert +\n        value.substr(selectionStart);\n      forceInput();\n      if (input != null && input.setSelectionRange != null) {\n        input.setSelectionRange(\n          restoreSelectionPosition,\n          restoreSelectionPosition,\n        );\n      }\n      selectionStart = restoreSelectionPosition;\n      selectionEnd = restoreSelectionPosition;\n    }\n  }\n\n  let preserveSpace = false;\n  let preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = false;\n  let preserveSpaceIndex = null;\n\n  function handleCursor() {\n    selectionStart = input.selectionStart;\n    selectionEnd = input.selectionEnd;\n    if (selectionStart == null || selectionEnd == null) return;\n  }\n\n  // Selection properties\n  $: hasSelection = selectionStart != null && selectionEnd != null;\n  $: individualSelection = hasSelection && selectionStart == selectionEnd;\n  $: selectionAtEnd = individualSelection && selectionStart == value.length;\n\n  // Autocomplete fields\n  $: searchPre = individualSelection ? value.substr(0, selectionStart) : null;\n  $: searchPost = individualSelection ? value.substr(selectionStart) : null;\n  // Show completions if the end of input follows or a whitespace followed by anything\n  $: showCompletions = searchPost != null && /^(\\s.*|)$/.test(searchPost);\n  $: fieldRaw =\n    searchPre != null && showCompletions\n      ? searchPre.match(\n          preserveSpace\n            ? /([a-z]+):([a-zA-Z0-9 -]*)$/\n            : /([a-z]+):([a-zA-Z0-9-]*)$/,\n        )\n      : null;\n  $: fieldPreIndex = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw.index : null;\n  $: fieldPre = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw[1] : null;\n  $: fieldPost = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw[2] : null;\n\n  function setPreserveSpace(space) {\n    if (space == true) {\n      preserveSpaceIndex = fieldPreIndex;\n    } else {\n      preserveSpaceIndex = null;\n    }\n    preserveSpace = space;\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    if (preserveSpace && !selectionAtEnd) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    if (preserveSpace && fieldPreIndex != preserveSpaceIndex) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n    }\n  }\n\n  function completionScore(completion, filter) {\n    // Calculate a score by how many characters match the filter\n    const text = completion.text.toLowerCase();\n    let score = 0;\n    let lastPos = 0;\n    let highlightLetters = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < filter.length; i++) {\n      const char = filter.charAt(i).toLowerCase();\n      const idx = text.indexOf(char, lastPos);\n      if (idx == -1) {\n        // Punish lack of match\n        score -= 1;\n      } else {\n        // Reward match based on proximity\n        score += 1 / (idx - lastPos + 1);\n        highlightLetters.push(idx);\n        lastPos = idx + 1;\n      }\n    }\n    return { score, highlightLetters };\n  }\n\n  function completionFilter(candidates, filter) {\n    if (filter.length == 0) return candidates;\n    // Filter completion candidates based on what you've started typing\n    const results = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < candidates.length; i++) {\n      const candidate = candidates[i];\n      const { score, highlightLetters } = completionScore(candidate, filter);\n      if (score != null) {\n        results.push({ score, highlightLetters, ...candidate });\n      }\n    }\n    results.sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score);\n    return results;\n  }\n\n  let completionX = \"\";\n\n  function setCompletionX(idx) {\n    if (\n      idx == null ||\n      mirror == null ||\n      highlights == null ||\n      highlights.length == 0\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Find which highlight the idx corresponds to\n\n    // First get all child chunk elements by following same rules as DOM\n    let allChunks = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < highlights.length; i++) {\n      const highlight = highlights[i];\n      allChunks = allChunks.concat(\n        highlight.type == \"raw\"\n          ? highlight.text.split(/( )/g).filter((x) => x.length > 0)\n          : [highlight.text],\n      );\n    }\n\n    let pos = 0;\n    let highlightIdx = allChunks.length - 1;\n    for (let i = 0; i < allChunks.length; i++) {\n      let end = pos + allChunks[i].length;\n      if (idx >= pos && idx < end) {\n        highlightIdx = i;\n        break;\n      }\n      pos = end;\n    }\n\n    if (\n      highlightIdx == null ||\n      highlightIdx < 0 ||\n      highlightIdx >= mirror.children.length\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Update completion X position\n    const completionLeft =\n      mirror.children[highlightIdx].firstChild.getBoundingClientRect().x -\n      mirror.getBoundingClientRect().x;\n    const completionRight =\n      mirror.getBoundingClientRect().right -\n      mirror.children[highlightIdx].firstChild.getBoundingClientRect().right;\n    // Anchor to left or right depending on which edge is closer\n    if (completionLeft <= completionRight) {\n      completionX = `left: ${completionLeft}px`;\n    } else {\n      completionX = `right: ${completionRight}px`;\n    }\n  }\n\n  let escPressed = false;\n\n  function setupCompletions() {\n    if (escPressed) {\n      completions = [];\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n      escPressed = false;\n    } else if (completions == null) {\n      // Skip this case (loading something async)\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"project\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        $projects.projects.map((project) => {\n          return {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: project.title,\n            feed: slugify(project.title, project.id),\n          };\n        }),\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"user\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      asyncComplete(\"user\", fieldPost);\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"organization\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      asyncComplete(\"org\", fieldPost);\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"access\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        [\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"public\",\n            info: \"Publicly accessible documents\",\n            feed: \"public\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"private\",\n            info: \"Privately accessible documents\",\n            feed: \"private\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"organization\",\n            info: \"Accessible at the organization level\",\n            feed: \"organization\",\n          },\n        ],\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"status\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        [\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"success\",\n            info: \"Documents ready for viewing and publishing\",\n            feed: \"success\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"readable\",\n            info: \"Documents ready for reading but still processing text\",\n            feed: \"readable\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"pending\",\n            info: \"Documents currently processing\",\n            feed: \"pending\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"error\",\n            info: \"Documents with errors in preparation\",\n            feed: \"error\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"nofile\",\n            info: \"Documents that were not successfully uploaded\",\n            feed: \"nofile\",\n          },\n        ],\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"language\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        languages.map((x) => ({\n          type: \"field\",\n          text: x[1],\n          feed: x[0],\n        })),\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"sort\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(sortCompletions, fieldPost);\n    } else {\n      completions = [];\n    }\n\n    if (completions != null && completions.length > 0) {\n      completionIndex = 0;\n    } else {\n      completionIndex = null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    setupCompletions(\n      fieldPre,\n      fieldPost,\n      fieldPreIndex,\n      searchPre,\n      searchPost,\n      escPressed,\n    );\n  }\n\n  $: processedCompletions =\n    completions == null ? null : processCompletions(completions);\n\n  let completionIndex = null;\n\n  $: selectedCompletion =\n    completionIndex == null || completions == null || completions.length == 0\n      ? null\n      : completions.filter(\n          (completion) => completion.index == completionIndex,\n        )[0];\n\n  $: noCompletion =\n    !selectionAtEnd ||\n    (selectedCompletion == null &&\n      (completions == null || completions.length == 0)) ||\n    (fieldPost != null && fieldPost.length > 0);\n  $: autocomplete = noCompletion\n    ? \"\"\n    : selectedCompletion == null\n    ? completions[0].feed\n    : selectedCompletion.feed;\n\n  function handleBlur() {\n    handleCursor();\n    completionIndex = null;\n  }\n\n  function handleKeyDown(e) {\n    if (preserveSpaceOnKeyPress) {\n      const char = String.fromCharCode(e.keyCode);\n      if (/[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]/.test(char)) {\n        setPreserveSpace(true);\n      }\n      preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = false;\n    }\n\n    // Tab or enter with completions\n    if (e.key == \"Tab\" || e.which == 13 || e.keyCode == 13) {\n      if (autocomplete != \"\") {\n        triggerCompletion({ feed: autocomplete });\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n\n      if (selectedCompletion != null) {\n        triggerCompletion(\n          selectedCompletion,\n          fieldPost != null ? fieldPost.length : 0,\n        );\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (e.key == \"Escape\") {\n      if (completions != null && completions.length > 0) {\n        escPressed = true;\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (e.which == 13 || e.keyCode == 13) {\n      // Search on enter\n      emit.search();\n      e.preventDefault();\n      return;\n    }\n\n    handleCursor();\n\n    // Prevent moving cursor to beginning/end\n    if (processedCompletions != null)\n      if (processedCompletions.count > 0) {\n        if (e.key == \"ArrowUp\") {\n          e.preventDefault();\n          if (completionIndex == null) {\n            completionIndex = processedCompletions.count - 1;\n          } else if (completionIndex > 0) {\n            completionIndex--;\n          } else {\n            completionIndex = null;\n          }\n        } else if (e.key == \"ArrowDown\") {\n          e.preventDefault();\n          if (completionIndex == null) {\n            completionIndex = 0;\n          } else if (completionIndex < processedCompletions.count - 1) {\n            completionIndex++;\n          } else {\n            completionIndex = null;\n          }\n        }\n      }\n  }\n\n  function handleKeyUp(e) {\n    handleCursor();\n  }\n\n  function ensureValidity(highlights) {\n    for (let i = 0; i < highlights.length; i++) {\n      const highlight = highlights[i];\n      if (highlight.type == \"field\") {\n        highlights[i] = {\n          ...fieldValid(highlight.text, example),\n          ...highlight,\n        };\n      }\n    }\n    return highlights;\n  }\n\n  $: highlights = ensureValidity(highlight(value), $projects, $orgsAndUsers);\n  export let transformedQuery;\n  $: transformedQuery = highlights\n    .map((x) => (x.transform != null ? x.transform : x.text))\n    .join(\"\");\n\n  onMount(() => {\n    // Trigger input resizing\n    // TODO: find a more elegant solution\n    window.dispatchEvent(new Event(\"resize\"));\n  });\n</script>\n\n<style lang=\"scss\">\n  $fontSize: 16px;\n  $wordSpacing: 1px;\n\n  .search {\n    border-radius: $radius;\n    margin: 0;\n    width: 100%;\n    position: relative;\n    box-sizing: border-box;\n    max-width: 750px;\n\n    :global(svg) {\n      position: absolute;\n      pointer-events: none;\n      padding: 13px 17px;\n    }\n\n    &.compact {\n      :global(svg) {\n        padding: 7px 17px;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  textarea {\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n    outline: none;\n    font-size: $fontSize;\n    background: #f1f2f4;\n\n    &.compact {\n      min-height: 32px;\n    }\n\n    &:focus {\n      background: white;\n      border: solid 1px $viewerDarkGray;\n\n      & + .mirror {\n        .autocomplete {\n          display: inline;\n        }\n\n        > .field > :global(span),\n        > .quote > :global(span) {\n          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03);\n        }\n      }\n\n      & ~ .tagbank {\n        display: block;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .mirror,\n  textarea {\n    line-height: 1.6;\n    font-family: inherit;\n    border: none;\n    padding: 9px 49px 9px 49px;\n    box-sizing: border-box;\n    border: solid 1px transparent;\n    width: 100%;\n    height: 100%;\n    overflow: hidden;\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\n    overflow-wrap: break-word;\n    word-spacing: $wordSpacing;\n\n    &.example {\n      padding: 9px 12px 9px 49px;\n    }\n\n    &.compact {\n      padding: 3px 12px 3px 49px;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .mirror {\n    position: absolute;\n    top: 0;\n    left: 0;\n    overflow: hidden;\n    height: calc(100% - 10px);\n    pointer-events: none;\n    color: black;\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: black;\n\n    &.compact {\n      height: calc(100% - 7px);\n    }\n\n    word-spacing: 0;\n    font-size: 0;\n\n    > span {\n      &.autocomplete {\n        $autocompleteColor: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.33);\n\n        color: $autocompleteColor;\n        -webkit-text-fill-color: $autocompleteColor;\n        display: none;\n      }\n\n      > :global(span) {\n        position: relative;\n        font-size: $fontSize;\n        word-spacing: $wordSpacing;\n\n        :global(b) {\n          font-weight: normal;\n        }\n      }\n\n      &.operator {\n        :global(b) {\n          color: $searchSpecial;\n          -webkit-text-fill-color: $searchSpecial;\n        }\n      }\n\n      &.field,\n      &.quote {\n        position: relative;\n\n        > :global(span) {\n          $fieldColor: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);\n\n          border-radius: $radius;\n          background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);\n          box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19);\n          color: $fieldColor;\n          -webkit-text-fill-color: $fieldColor;\n\n          :global(b) {\n            $keyColor: $searchSpecial;\n            color: $keyColor;\n            -webkit-text-fill-color: $keyColor;\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .closeicon {\n    @include buttonLike;\n    position: absolute;\n    right: 0;\n    top: 8px;\n    margin-top: -7.5px;\n    z-index: 1;\n    width: 49px;\n    height: 41px;\n  }\n\n  .tagbank {\n    display: none;\n    position: absolute;\n    background: white;\n    padding: 10px 0 5px 0;\n    z-index: 1;\n    box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.23);\n    border-radius: $radius;\n    margin-top: -4px;\n\n    .completions {\n      color: black;\n      font-size: 16px;\n      max-width: 450px;\n      user-select: none;\n\n      .completion {\n        padding: 5px 15px;\n\n        $activeColor: rgba(66, 148, 240, 0.15);\n\n        &.groupstart {\n          text-transform: uppercase;\n          font-weight: bold;\n          color: $gray;\n          font-size: 11px;\n        }\n\n        .negative {\n          color: $gray;\n        }\n\n        .info {\n          color: $gray;\n          font-size: 12px;\n          margin-top: 2px;\n          margin-bottom: 2px;\n        }\n\n        &.active {\n          background: $activeColor;\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  ::placeholder {\n    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.76);\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: $gray;\n  }\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"search\" class:compact>\n  {@html searchIconSvg}\n  <textarea\n    bind:this={input}\n    bind:value\n    disabled={example}\n    class:compact\n    class:example\n    placeholder={$_(\"searchBar.search\")}\n    use:textAreaResize={0}\n    spellcheck=\"false\"\n    on:keydown={handleKeyDown}\n    on:keyup={handleKeyUp}\n    on:input={handleCursor}\n    on:click={handleCursor}\n    on:touchend={handleCursor}\n    on:focus={handleCursor}\n    on:blur={handleBlur}\n  />\n  <div class=\"mirror\" bind:this={mirror} class:compact class:example>\n    {#each highlights as highlight}\n      {#if highlight.type == \"field\"}\n        <span class:field={highlight.valid}>\n          <NoWhitespace>\n            <b>{highlight.field}</b>\n            <span>{highlight.value}</span>\n          </NoWhitespace>\n        </span>\n      {:else if highlight.type == \"quote\"}\n        <span class=\"quote\">\n          <NoWhitespace><span>{highlight.text}</span></NoWhitespace>\n        </span>\n      {:else if highlight.type == \"operator\"}\n        <span class=\"operator\">\n          <NoWhitespace><b>{highlight.text}</b></NoWhitespace>\n        </span>\n      {:else}\n        {#each highlight.text.split(/( )/g) as rawText}\n          <!-- Split raw text by space to avoid line-break issues -->\n          {#if rawText != \"\"}<span> <span>{rawText}</span> </span>{/if}\n        {/each}\n      {/if}\n    {/each}\n    {#if autocomplete.length > 0}\n      <span class=\"autocomplete\"> <span>{autocomplete}</span> </span>\n    {/if}\n  </div>\n  {#if !example && value.length != 0}\n    <div class=\"closeicon\" on:click={() => (value = \"\")}>\n      {@html closeInlineSvg}\n    </div>\n  {/if}\n  <div class=\"tagbank\" style={completionX}>\n    <div class=\"completions\">\n      {#if processedCompletions == null}\n        <!-- Completions are loading -->\n        <div class=\"completion loading\">Loading...</div>\n      {:else}\n        {#each processedCompletions.completions as completion}\n          <div\n            class=\"completion\"\n            class:active={completionIndex != null &&\n              completionIndex == completion.index}\n            on:mouseover={() => {\n              if (completion.index != null) completionIndex = completion.index;\n            }}\n            on:mouseout={() => {\n              if (completion.index != null) completionIndex = null;\n            }}\n    }\n      numUploaded = total;\n    }\n  }\n  $: createProgressPercent = `${Math.floor(createProgress * 100)}%`;\n  $: processProgressPercent = `${Math.floor(processProgress * 100)}%`;\n\n  $: error newFile.name.toLowerCase().trim().endsWith(\".pdf\");\n        if (\n          (isPdf && newFile.size <= PDF_SIZE_LIMIT) ||\n          newFile.size <= DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT\n        ) {\n hasTooBigDocument = true;\n          }\n        }\n        tooManyFiles = false;\n      } else {\n        tooManyFiles = true;\n      }\n    }\n    tooManyBigFiles = [hasTooBigPdf, hasTooBigDocument];\n    files = files;\n  }\n\n  function removeFile(index) {\n    files = files.filter((file) => file.index != index);\n    tooManyBigFiles = false;\n    tooManyFiles = false;\n false,\n      key: null,\n    };\n  },\n  computed: {\n    isAuthenticated(key) {\n      return key !== null;\n    },\n  },\n});\n\nexport function login() {\n  setToken(true);\n}\n\nexport function logout() {\n  // TODO: use some Squarelet method and have a finally clause of removeToken()\n  // for now, we just \"forget\" we're logged in\n  removeToken();\n}\n\n// Token methods\nfunction initialize() {\n  try {\n    const storedData = localStorage.getItem(DOCUMENTCLOUD_TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY);\n    if (storedData === null) {\n      // Logged in\n      return;\n    }\n    if (storedData !== null) {\n      const key = JSON.parse(storedData);\n      setToken(key);\n      return;\n    }\n  } catch (e) {\n    removeToken();\n    return;\n  }\n\n  removeToken();\n  return;\n}\n\nfunction setToken(key) {\n  // Set the token state.\n  try {\n    localStorage.setItem(DOCUMENTCLOUD_TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify(key));\n  } catch (e) {\n    // Ignore if local storage is not available\n  }\n\n  auth.key = key;\n}\n\nfunction removeToken() {\n  try {\n    localStorage.removeItem(DOCUMENTCLOUD_TOKEN_STORAGE_KEY);\n  } catch (e) {\n    // Ignore if local storage is not available\n  }\n\n  auth.key = null;\n}\n\n// Initialize the token\ninitialize();\n","const languageCodes = process.env.LANGUAGE_CODES.split(\"|\");\nconst languageNames = codes.length; i++) {\n    results.push([codes[i], names[i]]);\n  }\n  results.sort((a, b) => (a[1] > b[1] ? 1 : a[1] < b[1] ? -1 : 0));\n  return results;\n}\n\nexport const languages = };\n  },\n  computed: {\n    hasDocuments(documents) {\n      return documents.documents.length > 0;\n    },\n    allSelected(hasDocuments, documents, layout) {\n      return (\n        hasDocuments info: \"Default Sort Option by Relevance\",\n    feed: \"score\",\n  },\n];\nconst validSorts = sortCompletions.map((x) => x.feed);\n\nexport function fieldValid(text, example = false) {\n  const fieldMatch = text.match(/^[^a-z]*([a-zA-Z0-9_-]+):(.*)$/);\n  if (fieldMatch == null) return { valid: false };\n  const field = fieldMatch[1];\n  const value = fieldMatch[2];\n  const id = extractSlugId(value);\n  if (field == \"project\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `projects:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual project, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"user\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `user:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual user, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"organization\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `organization:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual org, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"access\") {\n    return {\n      valid: id == \"public\" || id == \"organization\" || id == \"private\",\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"status\") {\n    return {\n      valid:\n        id == \"success\" ||\n        id == \"readable\" ||\n        id == \"pending\" ||\n        id == \"error\" ||\n        id == \"nofile\",\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"sort\") {\n    return {\n      valid: validSorts.includes(value),\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"tag\") {\n    return {\n      valid: value.trim().length > 0,\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"language\") {\n    return {\n      valid: id != null && languageOptions.includes(id),\n    };\n  } else if (field.startsWith(\"data_\")) {\n    return {\n      valid: field.length > \"data_\".length && value.trim().length > 0,\n    };\n  } else {\n    return {\n      valid: false,\n    };\n  }\n}\n"],"names":[],"sourceRoot":""}

{nFormatter(useCount, 1)}\n  </span>\n</div>\n","<script lang=\"ts\" context=\"module\">\n  import { writable, type Writable } from \"svelte/store\";\n\n  interface Author {\n    name?: string;\n    avatar?: string;\n  }\n\n  // API endpoint https://api.www.documentcloud.org/api/addons/\n  export interface AddOnListItem {\n    id: number;\n    name: string;\n    repository: string;\n    parameters: any;\n    description?: string;\n    author?: Author;\n    usage?: number;\n    categories: string[];\n    documents: string[];\n    active: boolean;\n    featured: boolean;\n    default: boolean;\n  }\n\n  export const pinned: Writable<AddOnListItem[]> = writable([]);\n</script>\n\n<script lang=\"ts\">\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n  import { baseApiUrl } from \"../../api/base.js\";\n  import { getCsrfToken } from \"../../api/session.js\";\n\n  import Pin from \"../../common/Pin.svelte\";\n  import AddOnPopularity from \"../Popularity.svelte\";\n\n  export let addon: AddOnListItem;\n\n  $: endpoint = new URL(`/api/addons/${addon.id}/`, baseApiUrl);\n  $: description = addon.parameters?.description;\n  $: if (!addon?.author) {\n    addon.author = { name: addon?.repository?.split(\"/\")[0] };\n  }\n\n  $: url = `#add-ons/${addon.repository}`;\n\n  async function toggle(event) {\n    event.preventDefault();\n\n    const csrftoken = getCsrfToken();\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n      method: \"PATCH\", // this component can only update whether an addon is active or not\n      headers: { \"X-CSRFToken\": csrftoken, \"Content-type\": \"application/json\" },\n    };\n\n    // optimistic update\n    addon.active = !addon.active;\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, {\n      ...options,\n      body: JSON.stringify({ active: addon.active }),\n    }).catch((err) => {\n      addon.active = !addon.active;\n      return {\n        ok: false,\n        statusText: String(err),\n      };\n    });\n\n    if (!resp.ok) {\n      // reset active state\n      addon.active = !addon.active;\n      console.error(`Problem updating add-on: ${resp.statusText}`);\n    }\n\n    // now that we've updated, set $pinned\n    $pinned = addon.active\n      ? [...$pinned, addon]\n      : $pinned.filter((a) => a.id !== addon.id);\n  }\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  .addon-link:hover .container {\n    background-color: var(--menuBg);\n  }\n  .container {\n \"../../api/session.js\";\n\n  export let run: Run;\n  export let compact = false;\n\n  let comment = \"\";\n\n  $: failure = run.status === \"failure\";\n  $: done = run.status !== \"queued\" && run.status !== \"in_progress\";\n\n  function getStatus(status) {\n    if (status === \"cancelled\") {\n      return $_(\"addonProgress.timedOut\");\n    }\n    return status\n      .split(\"_\")\n      .map((s) => s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.slice(1))\n      .join(\" \");\n  }\n\n  async function update(params: any, method = \"PATCH\") {\n    const endpoint = new URL(`/api/addon_runs/${run.uuid}/`, baseApiUrl);\n\n    if (method !== \"DELETE\") {\n      endpoint.searchParams.set(\"expand\", \"addon\");\n    }\n\n    const csrftoken = getCsrfToken();\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n      headers: { \"X-CSRFToken\": csrftoken },\n      method,\n    };\n\n    if (method !== \"DELETE\") {\n      options.body = JSON.stringify(params);\n      options.headers[\"Content-type\"] = \"application/json\";\n    }\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, options);\n\n    if (!resp.ok) {\n      throw new Error(resp.statusText);\n    }\n\n    // delete returns an empty response\n    if (method !== \"DELETE\") {\n      return resp.json();\n    }\n  }\n\n  export async function dismiss() {\n    run = await update({ dismissed: true });\n    $runs = $runs.filter((r) => r.uuid !== run.uuid);\n  }\n\n  export async function cancel() {\n    $cancelled = [...$cancelled, run.uuid];\n    await update({}, \"DELETE\");\n  }\n\n  function thumbsUp() {\n    rate(1);\n  }\n\n  function thumbsDown() {\n    rate(-1);\n  }\n\n  async function rate(val) {\n    const newVal = run.rating === val ? 0 : val;\n    run = await update({ rating: newVal });\n  }\n\n  async function submitFeedback() {\n    run = await update({ comment });\n  }\n\n  function date_format(s: string) {\n    return new .join(\",\");\n\n  // Bound to the file picker input\n  let picker;\n\n  function trigger() {\n    picker.click();\n  }\n\n  function handleFiles() {\n    const fileList = picker.files;\n    if let forceOcr = false;\n  let ocrEngine = \"tess4\";\n\n  const LIMIT = parseInt(process.env.UPLOAD_LIMIT);\n  const PDF_SIZE_LIMIT = parseInt(process.env.PDF_SIZE_LIMIT);\n  const PDF_SIZE_LIMIT_READABLE = process.env.PDF_SIZE_LIMIT_READABLE;\n  const DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT = parseInt(process.env.DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT);\n  const DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT_READABLE = process.env.DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT_READABLE;\n\n  let tooManyFiles = false;\n  let tooManyBigFiles = [false, false];\n\n  $: displayFiles = uploadMode ? uploadFiles : files;\n\n  let numUploaded;\n  let    for (let i = 0; i < uploadFiles.length; i++) {\n        total += uploadFiles[i].done ? 1 : 0;\n      }\n      numUploaded = total;\n    }\n  }\n  $: createProgressPercent = initialFiles });\n  });\n\n  function handleFiles({ detail: newFiles }) {\n    let hasTooBigPdf = false;\n    let hasTooBigDocument = false;\n\n    for (let i = 0; i < newFiles.length; i++) {\n      if (files.length < LIMIT) {\n        const newFile = newFiles[i];\n        const isPdf = newFile.name.toLowerCase().trim().endsWith(\".pdf\");\n        if (\n          (isPdf && newFile.size <= PDF_SIZE_LIMIT) ||\n          newFile.size <= DOCUMENT_SIZE_LIMIT\n        ) {\n          files.push({\n            index: id++,\n            file: newFile,\n          });\n        } else {\n          if (isPdf) {\n            hasTooBigPdf = true;\n          } else {\n            hasTooBigDocument = true;\n          }\n        }\n        tooManyFiles = false;\n      } else {\n        tooManyFiles = true;\n      }\n    }\n    tooManyBigFiles = [hasTooBigPdf, hasTooBigDocument];\n    files = files;\n  }\n\n  function removeFile(index) {\n    files = files.filter((file) => file.index != index);\n    tooManyBigFiles = false;\n    tooManyFiles = false;\n  }\n\n  function upload() {\n    uploadFiles = files.map((file, i) => {\n      return {\n        file: file.file,\n        progress: 0,\n        done: false,\n        index: i,\n      };\n    });\n    emit.setDismissable(false);\n    uploadMode = true;\n\n    uploadDocuments(\n      files,\n      access,\n      language,\n      forceOcr,\n // Process progress handler\n        processProgress = progress;\n      },\n      async (goodDocuments) => {\n        // All complete handler\n        uploadFiles = uploadFiles.map((file) => ({ ...file, done: true }));\n        layout.uploading = false;\n        await handleNewDocuments(goodDocuments);\n      },\n      (message) => {\n        layout.error = message;\n        layout.uploading animate:flip={{ duration: 400 }}>\n              <Document {embed} {dialog} {document} on:pick />\n            </div>\n          {/each}\n        {/if}\n        {#if $documents.documents.length == 0 && !$layout.loading}\n          <NoDocuments />\n        {/if}\n        {#if $orgsAndUsers.loggedIn}\n          <div class=\"toastouter\">\n            <div class=\"toast\">{$_(\"documents.dropFile\")}</div>\n          </div>\n        {/if}\n      </Draggable>\n    </div>\n\n    {#if embed}\n      <EmbedFooter {dialog} />\n    {:else}\n      <div class=\"narrowshow\">\n        <Paginator />\n      </div>\n    {/if}\n  </div>\n</Loader>\n","import { extractSlugId, isNumber } from \"@/util/string.js\";\n\nconst languageOptions = process.env.LANGUAGE_CODES.split(\"|\");\n\nexport const sortCompletions = [\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Created At (Descending)\",\n    info: \"Most Recent First\",\n    feed: \"created_at\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Created At (Ascending)\",\n    info: \"Oldest First\",\n    feed: \"-created_at\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Title (Ascending)\",\n    info: \"Document Title A-Z\",\n    feed: \"title\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Title (Descending)\",\n    info: \"Document Title Z-A\",\n    feed: \"-title\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Page Count (Descending)\",\n    info: \"Most Pages First\",\n    feed: \"page_count\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Page Count (Ascending)\",\n    info: \"Least Pages First\",\n    feed: \"-page_count\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Source (Ascending)\",\n    info: \"Document Source A-Z\",\n    feed: \"source\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Source (Descending)\",\n    info: \"Document Source Z-A\",\n    feed: \"-source\",\n  },\n  {\n    type: \"field\",\n    text: \"Score\",\n    info: \"Default Sort Option by Relevance\",\n    feed: \"score\",\n  },\n];\nconst validSorts = sortCompletions.map((x) => x.feed);\n\nexport function fieldValid(text, example = false) {\n  const fieldMatch = text.match(/^[^a-z]*([a-zA-Z0-9_-]+):(.*)$/);\n  if (fieldMatch == null) return { valid: false };\n  const field = fieldMatch[1];\n  const value = fieldMatch[2];\n  const id = extractSlugId(value);\n  if (field == \"project\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `projects:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual project, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"user\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `user:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual user, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"organization\") {\n    if (id == null) return { valid: false };\n    if (example) return { valid: true, transform: `organization:${id}` };\n    // IDs aren't checked for actual org, but will not return any useful results if not\n    return { valid: isNumber(id) };\n  } else if (field == \"access\") {\n    return {\n      valid: id == \"public\" || id == \"organization\" || id == \"private\",\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"status\") {\n    return {\n      valid:\n        id == \"success\" ||\n        id == \"readable\" ||\n        id == \"pending\" ||\n        id == \"error\" ||\n        id == \"nofile\",\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"sort\") {\n    return {\n      valid: validSorts.includes(value),\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"tag\") {\n    return {\n      valid: value.trim().length > 0,\n    };\n  } else if (field == \"language\") {\n    return {\n      valid: id != null && languageOptions.includes(id),\n    };\n  } else if (field.startsWith(\"data_\")) {\n    return {\n      valid: field.length > \"data_\".length && value.trim().length > 0,\n    };\n  } else {\n    return {\n      valid: false,\n    };\n  }\n}\n","<script>\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n  import { onMount } from \"svelte\";\n\n  import NoWhitespace from \"@/common/NoWhitespace.svelte\";\n\n  import emitter from \"@/emit.js\";\n  import { highlight } from \"@/search/parse.js\";\n  import { fieldValid, sortCompletions } from \"@/search/searchFields.js\";\n  import { orgsAndUsers } from \"@/manager/orgsAndUsers.js\";\n  import { projects } from \"@/manager/projects.js\";\n  import { textAreaResize } from \"@/util/textareaResize.js\";\n  import { languages } from \"@/api/languages.js\";\n  import {\n    autocompleteOrganizations,\n    autocompleteUsers,\n  } from \"@/api/orgAndUser.js\";\n  import { slugify } from \"@/util/string.js\";\n  import { timeoutify } from \"@/util/closure.js\";\n\n  // SVG assets\n  import searchIconSvg from \"@/assets/search_icon.svg?raw\";\n  import closeInlineSvg from \"@/assets/close_inline.svg?raw\";\n\n  const fieldAliases = {\n    projects: \"project\",\n    account: \"user\",\n    group: \"organization\",\n    order: \"sort\",\n  };\n\n  function alias(field) {\n    if (fieldAliases[field] != null) return fieldAliases[field];\n    return field;\n  }\n\n  const emit = emitter({\n    search() {},\n  });\n\n  export let value = \"\";\n  export let example = false;\n  export let compact = false;\n\n  let input;\n  let mirror;\n\n  function forceInput() {\n    if (input != null) {\n      input.value = value;\n      input.dispatchEvent(\n        new Event(\"input\", {\n          bubbles: true,\n          target: input,\n        }),\n      );\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    // Dispatch input event to handle textarea resize on load\n    forceInput(value);\n  }\n\n  let selectionStart = null;\n  let selectionEnd = null;\n\n  let completions = [];\n\n  const COMPLETION_LATENCY = 100;\n\n  const completionCache = {};\n\n  const asyncComplete = timeoutify((type, fieldPost) => {\n    const key = `${type}-${fieldPost}`;\n    if (completionCache[key] != null) {\n      const [mapped, fieldPost] = completionCache[key];\n      completions = completionFilter(mapped, fieldPost);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Clear completions\n    completions = null;\n    if (type == \"org\") {\n      autocompleteOrganizations(fieldPost).then((results) => {\n        const mappedOrgs = results.map((org) => {\n          return {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: org.name,\n            feed: slugify(org.name, org.id),\n          };\n        });\n        completionCache[key] = [mappedOrgs, fieldPost];\n        completions = completionFilter(mappedOrgs, fieldPost);\n      });\n    } else if (type == \"user\") {\n      autocompleteUsers(fieldPost).then((results) => {\n        completionCache[key] = results;\n        const mappedUsers = [];\n        for (let i = 0; i < results.length; i++) {\n          const user = results[i];\n          const isMe = orgsAndUsers.me != null && user.id == orgsAndUsers.me.id;\n          const mappedUser = {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: `${user.name}${isMe ? \" (you)\" : \"\"}`,\n            feed: slugify(user.name, user.id),\n          };\n          if (isMe) {\n            mappedUsers.unshift(mappedUser);\n          } else {\n            mappedUsers.push(mappedUser);\n          }\n        }\n\n        completionCache[key] = [mappedUsers, fieldPost];\n        completions = completionFilter(mappedUsers, fieldPost);\n      });\n    }\n  }, COMPLETION_LATENCY);\n\n  function processCompletions() {\n    let count = 0;\n    for (let i = 0; i < completions.length; i++) {\n      const completion = completions[i];\n      if (completion.type == \"field\") {\n        completion.index = count;\n        count++;\n      } else {\n        completion.index = null;\n      }\n    }\n    return {\n      completions,\n      count,\n    };\n  }\n\n  function triggerCompletion(completion, deleteChars = 0) {\n    if (\n      completion.feed != null &&\n      individualSelection &&\n      selectionStart != null\n    ) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n      const insert = completion.feed + \" \";\n      const restoreSelectionPosition =\n        selectionStart + insert.length - deleteChars;\n      value =\n        value.substr(0, selectionStart - deleteChars) +\n        insert +\n        value.substr(selectionStart);\n      forceInput();\n      if (input != null && input.setSelectionRange != null) {\n        input.setSelectionRange(\n          restoreSelectionPosition,\n          restoreSelectionPosition,\n        );\n      }\n      selectionStart = restoreSelectionPosition;\n      selectionEnd = restoreSelectionPosition;\n    }\n  }\n\n  let preserveSpace = false;\n  let preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = false;\n  let preserveSpaceIndex = null;\n\n  function handleCursor() {\n    selectionStart = input.selectionStart;\n    selectionEnd = input.selectionEnd;\n    if (selectionStart == null || selectionEnd == null) return;\n  }\n\n  // Selection properties\n  $: hasSelection = selectionStart != null && selectionEnd != null;\n  $: individualSelection = hasSelection && selectionStart == selectionEnd;\n  $: selectionAtEnd = individualSelection && selectionStart == value.length;\n\n  // Autocomplete fields\n  $: searchPre = individualSelection ? value.substr(0, selectionStart) : null;\n  $: searchPost = individualSelection ? value.substr(selectionStart) : null;\n  // Show completions if the end of input follows or a whitespace followed by anything\n  $: showCompletions = searchPost != null && /^(\\s.*|)$/.test(searchPost);\n  $: fieldRaw =\n    searchPre != null && showCompletions\n      ? searchPre.match(\n          preserveSpace\n            ? /([a-z]+):([a-zA-Z0-9 -]*)$/\n            : /([a-z]+):([a-zA-Z0-9-]*)$/,\n        )\n      : null;\n  $: fieldPreIndex = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw.index : null;\n  $: fieldPre = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw[1] : null;\n  $: fieldPost = fieldRaw != null ? fieldRaw[2] : null;\n\n  function setPreserveSpace(space) {\n    if (space == true) {\n      preserveSpaceIndex = fieldPreIndex;\n    } else {\n      preserveSpaceIndex = null;\n    }\n    preserveSpace = space;\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    if (preserveSpace && !selectionAtEnd) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    if (preserveSpace && fieldPreIndex != preserveSpaceIndex) {\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n    }\n  }\n\n  function completionScore(completion, filter) {\n    // Calculate a score by how many characters match the filter\n    const text = completion.text.toLowerCase();\n    let score = 0;\n    let lastPos = 0;\n    let highlightLetters = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < filter.length; i++) {\n      const char = filter.charAt(i).toLowerCase();\n      const idx = text.indexOf(char, lastPos);\n      if (idx == -1) {\n        // Punish lack of match\n        score -= 1;\n      } else {\n        // Reward match based on proximity\n        score += 1 / (idx - lastPos + 1);\n        highlightLetters.push(idx);\n        lastPos = idx + 1;\n      }\n    }\n    return { score, highlightLetters };\n  }\n\n  function completionFilter(candidates, filter) {\n    if (filter.length == 0) return candidates;\n    // Filter completion candidates based on what you've started typing\n    const results = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < candidates.length; i++) {\n      const candidate = candidates[i];\n      const { score, highlightLetters } = completionScore(candidate, filter);\n      if (score != null) {\n        results.push({ score, highlightLetters, ...candidate });\n      }\n    }\n    results.sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score);\n    return results;\n  }\n\n  let completionX = \"\";\n\n  function setCompletionX(idx) {\n    if (\n      idx == null ||\n      mirror == null ||\n      highlights == null ||\n      highlights.length == 0\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Find which highlight the idx corresponds to\n\n    // First get all child chunk elements by following same rules as DOM\n    let allChunks = [];\n    for (let i = 0; i < highlights.length; i++) {\n      const highlight = highlights[i];\n      allChunks = allChunks.concat(\n        highlight.type == \"raw\"\n          ? highlight.text.split(/( )/g).filter((x) => x.length > 0)\n          : [highlight.text],\n      );\n    }\n\n    let pos = 0;\n    let highlightIdx = allChunks.length - 1;\n    for (let i = 0; i < allChunks.length; i++) {\n      let end = pos + allChunks[i].length;\n      if (idx >= pos && idx < end) {\n        highlightIdx = i;\n        break;\n      }\n      pos = end;\n    }\n\n    if (\n      highlightIdx == null ||\n      highlightIdx < 0 ||\n      highlightIdx >= mirror.children.length\n    ) {\n      return;\n    }\n\n    // Update completion X position\n    const completionLeft =\n      mirror.children[highlightIdx].firstChild.getBoundingClientRect().x -\n      mirror.getBoundingClientRect().x;\n    const completionRight =\n      mirror.getBoundingClientRect().right -\n      mirror.children[highlightIdx].firstChild.getBoundingClientRect().right;\n    // Anchor to left or right depending on which edge is closer\n    if (completionLeft <= completionRight) {\n      completionX = `left: ${completionLeft}px`;\n    } else {\n      completionX = `right: ${completionRight}px`;\n    }\n  }\n\n  let escPressed = false;\n\n  function setupCompletions() {\n    if (escPressed) {\n      completions = [];\n      setPreserveSpace(false);\n      escPressed = false;\n    } else if (completions == null) {\n      // Skip this case (loading something async)\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"project\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        $projects.projects.map((project) => {\n          return {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: project.title,\n            feed: slugify(project.title, project.id),\n          };\n        }),\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"user\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      asyncComplete(\"user\", fieldPost);\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"organization\") {\n      if (!preserveSpace && fieldPost == \"\") {\n        preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = true;\n      }\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      asyncComplete(\"org\", fieldPost);\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"access\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        [\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"public\",\n            info: \"Publicly accessible documents\",\n            feed: \"public\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"private\",\n            info: \"Privately accessible documents\",\n            feed: \"private\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"organization\",\n            info: \"Accessible at the organization level\",\n            feed: \"organization\",\n          },\n        ],\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"status\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        [\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"success\",\n            info: \"Documents ready for viewing and publishing\",\n            feed: \"success\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"readable\",\n            info: \"Documents ready for reading but still processing text\",\n            feed: \"readable\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"pending\",\n            info: \"Documents currently processing\",\n            feed: \"pending\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"error\",\n            info: \"Documents with errors in preparation\",\n            feed: \"error\",\n          },\n          {\n            type: \"field\",\n            text: \"nofile\",\n            info: \"Documents that were not successfully uploaded\",\n            feed: \"nofile\",\n          },\n        ],\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"language\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(\n        languages.map((x) => ({\n          type: \"field\",\n          text: x[1],\n          feed: x[0],\n        })),\n        fieldPost,\n      );\n    } else if (alias(fieldPre) == \"sort\") {\n      setCompletionX(fieldPreIndex);\n      completions = completionFilter(sortCompletions, fieldPost);\n    } else {\n      completions = [];\n    }\n\n    if (completions != null && completions.length > 0) {\n      completionIndex = 0;\n    } else {\n      completionIndex = null;\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: {\n    setupCompletions(\n      fieldPre,\n      fieldPost,\n      fieldPreIndex,\n      searchPre,\n      searchPost,\n      escPressed,\n    );\n  }\n\n  $: processedCompletions =\n    completions == null ? null : processCompletions(completions);\n\n  let completionIndex = null;\n\n  $: selectedCompletion =\n    completionIndex == null || completions == null || completions.length == 0\n      ? null\n      : completions.filter(\n          (completion) => completion.index == completionIndex,\n        )[0];\n\n  $: noCompletion =\n    !selectionAtEnd ||\n    (selectedCompletion == null &&\n      (completions == null || completions.length == 0)) ||\n    (fieldPost != null && fieldPost.length > 0);\n  $: autocomplete = noCompletion\n    ? \"\"\n    : selectedCompletion == null\n    ? completions[0].feed\n    : selectedCompletion.feed;\n\n  function handleBlur() {\n    handleCursor();\n    completionIndex = null;\n  }\n\n  function handleKeyDown(e) {\n    if (preserveSpaceOnKeyPress) {\n      const char = String.fromCharCode(e.keyCode);\n      if (/[a-zA-Z0-9-_ ]/.test(char)) {\n        setPreserveSpace(true);\n      }\n      preserveSpaceOnKeyPress = false;\n    }\n\n    // Tab or enter with completions\n    if (e.key == \"Tab\" || e.which == 13 || e.keyCode == 13) {\n      if (autocomplete != \"\") {\n        triggerCompletion({ feed: autocomplete });\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n\n      if (selectedCompletion != null) {\n        triggerCompletion(\n          selectedCompletion,\n          fieldPost != null ? fieldPost.length : 0,\n        );\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (e.key == \"Escape\") {\n      if (completions != null && completions.length > 0) {\n        escPressed = true;\n        e.preventDefault();\n        return;\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (e.which == 13 || e.keyCode == 13) {\n      // Search on enter\n      emit.search();\n      e.preventDefault();\n      return;\n    }\n\n    handleCursor();\n\n    // Prevent moving cursor to beginning/end\n    if (processedCompletions != null)\n      if (processedCompletions.count > 0) {\n        if (e.key == \"ArrowUp\") {\n          e.preventDefault();\n          if (completionIndex == null) {\n            completionIndex = processedCompletions.count - 1;\n          } else if (completionIndex > 0) {\n            completionIndex--;\n          } else {\n            completionIndex = null;\n          }\n        } else if (e.key == \"ArrowDown\") {\n          e.preventDefault();\n          if (completionIndex == null) {\n            completionIndex = 0;\n          } else if (completionIndex < processedCompletions.count - 1) {\n            completionIndex++;\n          } else {\n            completionIndex = null;\n          }\n        }\n      }\n  }\n\n  function handleKeyUp(e) {\n    handleCursor();\n  }\n\n  function ensureValidity(highlights) {\n    for (let i = 0; i < highlights.length; i++) {\n      const highlight = highlights[i];\n      if (highlight.type == \"field\") {\n        highlights[i] = {\n          ...fieldValid(highlight.text, example),\n          ...highlight,\n        };\n      }\n    }\n    return highlights;\n  }\n\n  $: highlights = ensureValidity(highlight(value), $projects, $orgsAndUsers);\n  export let transformedQuery;\n  $: transformedQuery = highlights\n    .map((x) => (x.transform != null ? x.transform : x.text))\n    .join(\"\");\n\n  onMount(() => {\n    // Trigger input resizing\n    // TODO: find a more elegant solution\n    window.dispatchEvent(new Event(\"resize\"));\n  });\n</script>\n\n<style lang=\"scss\">\n  $fontSize: 16px;\n  $wordSpacing: 1px;\n\n  .search {\n    border-radius: $radius;\n    margin: 0;\n    width: 100%;\n    position: relative;\n    box-sizing: border-box;\n    max-width: 750px;\n\n    :global(svg) {\n      position: absolute;\n      pointer-events: none;\n      padding: 13px 17px;\n    }\n\n    &.compact {\n      :global(svg) {\n        padding: 7px 17px;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  textarea {\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;\n    outline: none;\n    font-size: $fontSize;\n    background: #f1f2f4;\n\n    &.compact {\n      min-height: 32px;\n    }\n\n    &:focus {\n      background: white;\n      border: solid 1px $viewerDarkGray;\n\n      & + .mirror {\n        .autocomplete {\n          display: inline;\n        }\n\n        > .field > :global(span),\n        > .quote > :global(span) {\n          background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.03);\n        }\n      }\n\n      & ~ .tagbank {\n        display: block;\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .mirror,\n  textarea {\n    line-height: 1.6;\n    font-family: inherit;\n    border: none;\n    padding: 9px 49px 9px 49px;\n    box-sizing: border-box;\n    border: solid 1px transparent;\n    width: 100%;\n    height: 100%;\n    overflow: hidden;\n    white-space: pre-wrap;\n    overflow-wrap: break-word;\n    word-spacing: $wordSpacing;\n\n    &.example {\n      padding: 9px 12px 9px 49px;\n    }\n\n    &.compact {\n      padding: 3px 12px 3px 49px;\n    }\n  }\n\n  .mirror {\n    position: absolute;\n    top: 0;\n    left: 0;\n    overflow: hidden;\n    height: calc(100% - 10px);\n    pointer-events: none;\n    color: black;\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: black;\n\n    &.compact {\n      height: calc(100% - 7px);\n    }\n\n    word-spacing: 0;\n    font-size: 0;\n\n    > span {\n      &.autocomplete {\n        $autocompleteColor: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.33);\n\n        color: $autocompleteColor;\n        -webkit-text-fill-color: $autocompleteColor;\n        display: none;\n      }\n\n      > :global(span) {\n        position: relative;\n        font-size: $fontSize;\n        word-spacing: $wordSpacing;\n\n        :global(b) {\n          font-weight: normal;\n        }\n      }\n\n      &.operator {\n        :global(b) {\n          color: $searchSpecial;\n          -webkit-text-fill-color: $searchSpecial;\n        }\n      }\n\n      &.field,\n      &.quote {\n        position: relative;\n\n        > :global(span) {\n          $fieldColor: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);\n\n          border-radius: $radius;\n          background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);\n          box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19);\n          color: $fieldColor;\n          -webkit-text-fill-color: $fieldColor;\n\n          :global(b) {\n            $keyColor: $searchSpecial;\n            color: $keyColor;\n            -webkit-text-fill-color: $keyColor;\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  .closeicon {\n    @include buttonLike;\n    position: absolute;\n    right: 0;\n    top: 8px;\n    margin-top: -7.5px;\n    z-index: 1;\n    width: 49px;\n    height: 41px;\n  }\n\n  .tagbank {\n    display: none;\n    position: absolute;\n    background: white;\n    padding: 10px 0 5px 0;\n    z-index: 1;\n    box-shadow: 0 0 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.23);\n    border-radius: $radius;\n    margin-top: -4px;\n\n    .completions {\n      color: black;\n      font-size: 16px;\n      max-width: 450px;\n      user-select: none;\n\n      .completion {\n        padding: 5px 15px;\n\n        $activeColor: rgba(66, 148, 240, 0.15);\n\n        &.groupstart {\n          text-transform: uppercase;\n          font-weight: bold;\n          color: $gray;\n          font-size: 11px;\n        }\n\n        .negative {\n          color: $gray;\n        }\n\n        .info {\n          color: $gray;\n          font-size: 12px;\n          margin-top: 2px;\n          margin-bottom: 2px;\n        }\n\n        &.active {\n          background: $activeColor;\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n\n  ::placeholder {\n    color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.76);\n    -webkit-text-fill-color: $gray;\n  }\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"search\" class:compact>\n  {@html searchIconSvg}\n  <textarea\n    bind:this={input}\n    bind:value\n    disabled={example}\n    class:compact\n    class:example\n    placeholder={$_(\"searchBar.search\")}\n    use:textAreaResize={0}\n    spellcheck=\"false\"\n    on:keydown={handleKeyDown}\n    on:keyup={handleKeyUp}\n    on:input={handleCursor}\n    on:click={handleCursor}\n    on:touchend={handleCursor}\n    on:focus={handleCursor}\n    on:blur={handleBlur}\n  />\n  <div class=\"mirror\" bind:this={mirror} class:compact class:example>\n    {#each highlights as highlight}\n      {#if highlight.type == \"field\"}\n        <span class:field={highlight.valid}>\n          <NoWhitespace>\n            <b>{highlight.field}</b>\n            <span>{highlight.value}</span>\n          </NoWhitespace>\n        </span>\n      {:else if != null) completionIndex = completion.index;\n            }}\n            on:mouseout={() => {\n              if (completion.index != null) completionIndex = null;\n            }}\n iframe.contentWindow) {\n      const { width, height, updateStyleProps } = event.data;\n      if (width != null) {\n        iframe.width = width;\n      }\n      if (height != null) {\n iframe.style.maxHeight,\n          );\n          const existingMinHeight = parseFloat(\n            iframe.dataset.cacheminheight || iframe.style.minHeight,\n          );\n          if (\n let timer = null;\n\n  return (...args) => {\n    if (timer != null) {\n      cancelAnimationFrame(timer);\n      timer = null;\n    }\n\n    timer = requestAnimationFrame(() => {\n      timer = null;\n      fn(...args);\n    });\n  };\n}\n\nexport function timeoutify(fn, timeout = 100) {\n  let timer = null;\n\n  return (...args) => {\n    if (timer != null) {\n      clearTimeout(timer);\n      timer = null;\n    }\n\n    timer = setTimeout(() => {\n      timer = null;\n      fn(...args);\n    }, timeout);\n  };\n}\n\nexport function ignoreFirst(closure) {\n  // Ignore first invocation of @param {object} params\n * @returns {import(\"svelte\").ComponentType}\n */\nexport function autofield(params, fallback = Text) {\n  const type = String(params.type).toLowerCase();\n\n  if );\n  }\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  form {\n    width: 100%;\n  }\n\n  fieldset {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: column;\n    gap: 1em;\n    margin: 0 0 1em 0;\n    padding: 1em;\n lang=\"ts\">\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n  import { onMount } from \"svelte\";\n\n  import type { AddOnListItem } from \"../browser/AddOnListItem.svelte\";\n  import ScheduledEvent, { type Event } from \"../runs/ScheduledEvent.svelte\";\n\n  import { baseApiUrl } from \"../../api/base.js\";\n\n  export let addon: AddOnListItem;\n  export let events: Event[] = [];\n  export let open: boolean = false;\n\n  let error: Error;\n  let next: string;\n\n  export async function load() {\n    if (!addon) return;\n\n    const endpoint = new URL(\n      `/api/addon_events/?expand=addon&addon=${addon.id}`,\n      baseApiUrl,\n    );\n\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n    };\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, options).catch((e) => {\n      return {\n        ok: false,\n        statusText: e.message,\n        json() {},\n      };\n    });\n\n    if (!resp.ok) {\n      error = new Error(resp.statusText);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const { results, next_url } = await resp.json();\n\n    events = results;\n    next = next_url;\n  }\n\n  onMount(async () => {\n    if (events.length === 0) {\n      await load();\n    }\n  });\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  .scheduled-list {\n    width: 100%;\n  }\n\n  summary {\n    cursor: pointer;\n  }\n\n  .scheduled-list ul {\n    margin: 0;\n    padding: 0;\n {$_(\"addonDispatchDialog.showAddons\", {\n        values: { n: events.length },\n      })}\n    </summary>\n\n    <ul>\n      {#each events as event}\n        <li><ScheduledEvent {event} /></li>\n      {/each}\n    </ul>\n  </details>\n{/if}\n","<svelte:options accessors={true} />\n\n<script lang=\"ts\">\n  import { onMount, tick } from \"svelte\";\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n\n  import type { AddOnListItem } from \"../browser/AddOnListItem.svelte\";\n  import type { Event } from \"../runs/ScheduledEvent.svelte\";\n\n  import Button from \"../../common/Button.svelte\";\n  import Drawer from \"../Drawer.svelte\";\n  import Form, { values } from \"./Form.svelte\";\n  import Header from \"./Header.svelte\";\n  import Selection from \"./Selection.svelte\";\n  import ScheduledInset from \"./ScheduledInset.svelte\";\n  import { eventValues, schedules } from \"../runs/ScheduledEvent.svelte\";\n\n  import { baseApiUrl } from \"../../api/base.js\";\n  import { getCsrfToken } from \"../../api/session.js\";\n  import { pushToast } from \"../../common/Toast.svelte\";\n  import { runs } from \"../progress/AddonRun.svelte\";\n\n  export let visible: boolean = false;\n  export let addon: AddOnListItem;\n  export let event: Event;\n\n  let error: Error | null;\n\n  let drawer: Drawer;\n  let form: Form;\n  let scheduled: ScheduledInset;\n  let selection: Selection;\n\n  $: loading = !addon;\n  $: if (error) {\n    pushToast(error.message, \"error\");\n  }\n\n  $: if (!visible) {\n    reset();\n  }\n\n  onMount(() => {\n    if (event) {\n      $values = {\n        ...event.parameters,\n        event: schedules[event.event],\n      };\n    }\n  });\n\n  // extract initial form values from querystring\n  function valuesFromQS(initial: any) {\n    let qs = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);\n\n    // only accept values in properties\n    const { properties } = addon.parameters;\n    const values = Object.fromEntries(\n      Array.from(qs).filter(([k, v]) => properties.hasOwnProperty(k)),\n    );\n\n    if (qs.has(\"event\")) {\n      values[\"event\"] = qs.get(\"event\");\n    }\n\n    return { ...initial, ...values };\n  }\n\n  async function load_addon(repo: string) {\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n    };\n\n    const endpoint = new URL(`/api/addons/?repository=${repo}`, baseApiUrl);\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, options)\n      .then((r) => r.json())\n      .catch((err) => {\n        error = err;\n        addon = null;\n\n        return { results: [], error: err };\n      });\n\n    if (resp.results.length > 0) {\n      // should only ever be one result\n      addon = resp.results[0];\n      event = null;\n      error = null;\n    } else {\n      addon = null;\n      event = null;\n      error = new Error(\"Not found\");\n    }\n  }\n\n  async function load_event(id: number) {\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n    };\n\n    const endpoint = new URL(\n      `/api/addon_events/${id}/?expand=addon`,\n      baseApiUrl,\n    );\n\n    // give temp names so we can re-assign\n    const { addon: a, ...e } = await fetch(endpoint, options).then((r) =>\n      r.json(),\n    );\n\n    addon = a;\n    event = e;\n\n    $values = {\n      ...event.parameters,\n      event: schedules[event.event],\n    };\n  }\n\n  async function onSubmit(e) {\n    e.preventDefault();\n    const { valid, errors } = form.validate();\n\n    if (!valid) {\n      console.error(errors);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    let promises = [];\n\n    // if we're editing an event, any save should update the schedule\n    if (event || $values[\"event\"] !== \"disabled\") {\n      promises.push(schedule());\n    }\n\n    // dispatch when we first create an event\n    // or if there's no scheduling\n    if (!event) {\n      promises.push(send());\n    }\n\n    await Promise.all(promises);\n\n    close();\n  }\n\n  /*\n   * Dispatch a single add-on run\n   */\n  async function send() {\n    const { selection, ...parameters } = $values;\n    const payload = {\n      parameters,\n      ...selection,\n      addon: addon.id,\n    };\n\n    const csrftoken = getCsrfToken();\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: { \"X-CSRFToken\": csrftoken, \"Content-type\": \"application/json\" },\n      body: JSON.stringify(payload),\n    };\n\n    const endpoint = new URL(\"/api/addon_runs/?expand=addon\", baseApiUrl);\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, options);\n\n    if (!resp.ok) {\n      error = new Error(resp.statusText);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    const run = await resp.json();\n    $runs = [run, ...$runs];\n\n    pushToast($_(\"addonDispatchDialog.runSuccess\"), \"success\");\n  }\n\n  /*\n   * Create an add-on event to schedule future runs\n   */\n  async function schedule() {\n    if (!$values.event) {\n      throw new Error(`Missing event data: ${JSON.stringify($values)}`);\n    }\n\n    const { event: evt, selection, ...parameters } = $values;\n\n    const payload = {\n      parameters,\n      ...selection,\n      addon: addon.id,\n      event: eventValues[evt],\n    };\n\n    const path = event\n      ? `/api/addon_events/${event.id}/`\n      : \"/api/addon_events/\";\n\n    const endpoint = new URL(path, baseApiUrl);\n\n    const csrftoken = getCsrfToken();\n    const options: RequestInit = {\n      credentials: \"include\",\n      method: event ? \"PUT\" : \"POST\", // update or create?\n      headers: { \"X-CSRFToken\": csrftoken, \"Content-type\": \"application/json\" },\n      body: JSON.stringify(payload),\n    };\n\n    const resp = await fetch(endpoint, options);\n\n    if (!resp.ok) {\n      error = new Error(resp.statusText);\n      return;\n    }\n\n    pushToast($_(\"addonDispatchDialog.scheduleSuccess\"), \"success\");\n  }\n\n  function reset() {\n    $values = { event: \"disabled\", selection: null };\n  }\n\n  function close() {\n    drawer.close();\n    reset();\n  }\n\n  export async function open(repo: string, id: number | null) {\n    addon = null;\n    await tick();\n    if (id) {\n      await load_event(id);\n    } else {\n      await load_addon(repo);\n    }\n\n    $values = valuesFromQS($values);\n\n    visible = true;\n  }\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  [slot=\"content\"] {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n    gap: 1em;\n    padding: 1em;\n    max-width: 60ch;\n    transition: opacity 0.25s ease;\n  }\n\n  [slot=\"content\"].loading {\n    opacity: 0;\n  }\n\n  .controls {\n    display: flex;\n    justify-content: space-between;\n  }\n</style>\n\n<Drawer\n  anchor=\"right\"\n  bind:this={drawer}\n  bind:visible\n  on:open\n  on:close\n  on:close={reset}\n>\n  <div slot=\"content\" class:loading>\n    {#if addon}\n      <Header {addon} />\n\n      <ScheduledInset bind:this={scheduled} {addon} />\n\n      <Form\n        bind:this={form}\n        on:submit={onSubmit}\n        properties={addon.parameters.properties}\n        required={addon.parameters.required}\n        eventOptions={addon.parameters.eventOptions}\n        {event}\n      >\n        <!-- todo: decide if this should render for scheduled add-ons -->\n        <!-- this only applies to add-ons running against existing documents -->\n        <Selection\n          bind:this={selection}\n          bind:value={$values[\"selection\"]}\n          slot=\"after\"\n          documents={new Set(addon.parameters.documents)}\n        />\n\n        <div slot=\"controls\" class=\"controls\">\n          <div class=\"primary\">\n            {#if event}\n              <Button type=\"submit\" label={$_(\"dialog.save\")} />\n            {:else}\n              <Button type=\"submit\" label={$_(\"dialog.dispatch\")} />\n            {/if}\n          </div>\n          <div class=\"secondary\">\n            <Button\n              secondary\n              type=\"button\"\n              on:click={reset}\n              label={$_(\"dialog.reset\")}\n            />\n            <Button\n              secondary\n              type=\"button\"\n              on:click={close}\n              label={$_(\"dialog.cancel\")}\n            />\n          </div>\n        </div>\n      </Form>\n    {/if}\n  </div>\n</Drawer>\n","<script lang=\"ts\">\n  import { onMount } from \"svelte\";\n  import { _ } from \"svelte-i18n\";\n\n  import Button from \"../../common/Button.svelte\";\n  import Clock24 from \"svelte-octicons/lib/Clock24.svelte\";\n  import Error from \"../../common/icons/Error.svelte\";\n  import Loader from \"../../common/Loader.svelte\";\n  import Paginator from \"../Paginator.svelte\";\n  import ScheduledEvent, { type Event } from \"./ScheduledEvent.svelte\";\n\n  import { baseApiUrl } from \"../../api/base.js\";\n\n  export let per_page = 5;\n\n  // https://api.www.documentcloud.org/api/addon_events/?expand=addon\n  const endpoint = new URL(\"/api/addon_events/?expand=addon\", baseApiUrl);\n  const options: RequestInit = {\n    credentials: \"include\",\n  };\n  let res: {\n    next?: string | null;\n    previous?: string | null;\n    results?: Event[];\n  } = {};\n  let loading = false;\n  let error: string;\n\n  $: next_url = res.next ? new URL(res.next) : null;\n  $: prev_url = res.previous ? new URL(res.previous) : null;\n  $: events = res.results ?? [];\n  $: empty = !loading && res.results?.length === 0;\n\n  export async function load(url?: string | URL) {\n    try {\n      if (!url) {\n        url = endpoint;\n      }\n\n      if (!(url instanceof URL)) {\n        url = new URL(url);\n      }\n\n      url.searchParams.set(\"per_page\", String(per_page));\n      loading = true;\n      const resp = await fetch(url, options);\n\n      if (resp.ok) {\n        res = await resp.json();\n      } else {\n        error = resp.statusText;\n      }\n      loading = false;\n    } catch (error) {\n      error = error.message;\n      loading = false;\n    }\n  }\n\n  $: loadNext = () => load(next_url);\n  $: loadPrev = () => load(prev_url);\n\n  onMount(load);\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  .scheduled-list ul {\n    margin: 0;\n    padding: 0;\n    list-style-type: none;\n  }\n  .scheduled-list li {\n    padding: 0;\n  }\n  .empty,\n  .loading,\n  .error {\n    margin: 2em 1em;\n    color: var(--darkgray);\n    fill: var(--gray);\n  }\n  .error {\n    color: var(--caution);\n  }\n  .empty .icon {\n    transform: scale(2);\n    opacity: 0.4;\n  }\n  .error .icon {\n    height: 3em;\n    width: 3em;\n  }\n  .empty,\n  .error,\n  .loading {\n    display: flex;\n    flex-direction: column;\n    align-items: center;\n  }\n</style>\n\n<div class=\"scheduled-list\">\n  {#if empty}\n    <div class=\"empty\">\n      <div <p>{$_(\"addonRuns.upcoming.loading\")}</p>\n    </div>\n  {:else if error}\n    <div class=\"error\">\n      <div class=\"icon\"><Error /></div>\n      <p>{error}</p>\n      <Button action on:click={() => load()}\n        >{$_(\"addonRuns.upcoming.retry\")}</Button\n      >\n    </div>\n  {:else}\n    <ul>\n      {#each events as event}\n        <li><ScheduledEvent {event} /></li>\n      {/each}\n    </ul>\n  {/if}\n  {#if prev_url || next_url}\n    <Paginator\n      has_next={Boolean(next_url)}\n      has_previous={Boolean(prev_url)}\n      on:next={loadNext}\n      on:previous={loadPrev}\n    />\n  {/if}\n</div>\n","<script context=\"module\" lang=\"ts\">\n  import Button from \"../../common/Button.svelte\";\n  import type { AddOnListItem } from \"../browser/AddOnListItem.svelte\";\n  // https://api.www.documentcloud.org/api/addon_runs/?expand=addon\n  export interface Run {\n    uuid: string;\n    addon: AddOnListItem;\n    user: number;\n    status: \"success\" | \"failure\" | \"queued\" | \"in_progress\";\n    progress: number;\n    message: string;\n    file_url?: string | null;\n    dismissed: boolean;\n    rating: number;\n    comment: string;\n    created_at: string;\n    updated_at: string;\n  }\n</script>\n\n<script lang=\"ts\">\n  import {\n    CheckCircle24,\n    Paperclip16,\n    Hourglass24,\n    Alert24,\n    Question24,\n    Sync24,\n  } from \"svelte-octicons\";\n\n  export let run;\n\n  $: ranAt = new Date(run.created_at);\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  @keyframes spin {\n    0% {\n      transform:   flex: 0 1 auto;\n    margin: 0;\n  }\n  .success.icon {\n    fill: var(--tertiary);\n  }\n  .failure.icon {\n    fill: var(--caution);\n  }\n  .queued.icon {\n    fill: var(--gray);\n  }\n  .in-progress.icon {\n    display: block;\n    fill: var(--primary);\n    transform-origin: center center;\n    animation: spin 2s linear infinite reverse;\n    animation-play-state: running;\n    & svg {\n      display: block;\n    }\n  }\n  .unknown-status.icon {\n    fill: var(--gray);\n  }\n  .info {\n    flex: 1 1 auto;\n    display: flex;\n    align-items: center;\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n createEventDispatcher, onMount } from \"svelte\";\n  import { slide } from \"svelte/transition\";\n\n  export let anchor: string = \"center\";\n  export let visible: boolean = false;\n\n  const dispatch = createEventDispatcher();\n  const instance = { close };\n\n  let dialog: HTMLElement;\n\n  onMount(() => {\n    drawers.add(instance);\n\n    return () => {\n      drawers.delete(instance);\n    };\n  });\n\n  function closeOthers() {\n    drawers.forEach((d: closer) => {\n      d.close(true);\n    });\n  }\n\n  export function open(quiet = false) {\n    visible = true;\n    closeOthers();\n    if (!quiet) dispatch(\"open\");\n  }\n\n  export function close(quiet = false) {\n    visible = false;\n    if (!quiet) dispatch(\"close\");\n  }\n\n  export function toggle(quiet = false) {\n    visible = !visible;\n    if (!quiet) dispatch(visible ? \"open\" : \"close\");\n  }\n\n  function onKeyPress(e: KeyboardEvent) {\n    if (visible && e.key === \"Escape\") {\n      close();\n    }\n  }\n</script>\n\n<style>\n  .drawer {\n    background-color: var(--menuBg, white);\n    border: 1px solid #ccc;\n    border-radius: calc(var(--radius, 3px) * 3);\n
